column5: I was thinking of grabbing a couple salties today for algonquin, where can you get them? Thanks!
I got a pair at sail in burlington, 35$ each, a few weeks ago
Really? I keep looking there and the only ones I see are the cheaply built $60 holders that I can't even use for my canoe. What section did you find them in?
Thanks terry, I knew that they sold them but on their site it says that they're out of stock, but.... I just called and they have them! Thanks!
I didn't see them when I went to the vaughn location, but they were right at the top of the stairs at burlington, full display of the saltys and the single clamp model
Sorry I was talking about vaughn...

Depending on how soon you need them, etackle is another great option. There was actually a threadabout these last week with a few other places that would have them if bass pro happens to sell out before you get there
Alright I got one at bass pro, so far I love how smooth they are to use, thanks!
